input_text:
Job Title: Fleet Logistics Coordinator

Location: Fenton, MO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
The Logistics Coordinator is responsible for facilitating Fleet order entry and scheduling, both inside and outside Vinyl Imagesâ€™ physical location. They deliver exceptional customer service through effective communication and consistent adherence to processes and procedures.

Accomplishes results by utilizing Trello, Outlook, and QuickBooks to create and track orders, and effectively communicate with customers and VI Team members.

Their goal is to ensure customers and installers both receive a superior experience by providing personalized support handling any issues and effectively communicating during the entire process of order placement to install completion to billing.

Compensation

$16 - $18 hourly

Responsibilities

General Skills & Core Competencies

Time management and organizational skills.Successful conflict resolution and problem-solving.Exceptional attention to detail and thoroughness in the execution of tasks.Effective interpersonal and communication skills, including writing, speaking, and active listening.Consistently increases fleet vehicle knowledge base to improve customer support knowledge base.Comfortable in a fast-paced and high-pressure environment.Creatively solves problems and overcomes obstacles by thinking critically.

Process & Procedure

Knowledge and execution of company policies.Thoroughly performs internal processes for increased productivity.Functional knowledge of used software Trello, QuickBooks, Outlook, Excel, Google Drive/Docs

Customer Satisfaction

Ensures that the business delivers superior, consistent products through quality control standards. Checks all completed units to ensure customer marketing is cohesive.Strong understanding of business goals and standards for customer service.Developing new solutions to meet client needs.

Qualifications

Excellent time management and organization skills, especially the ability to prioritize and multitask.Effective and professional communication abilities, including being able to communicate with all levels of employees, vendors, and clients or guests.Excellent ability to critically think through daily tasks and obstaclesGreat customer service and interpersonal skills.Good computer skills, including basic troubleshooting skills.Familiarity with multiple types of vehicles, tools, vinyl materials, and industry-related items, in order to effectively answer customer questions is recommended but not required.

About Company

Our story began in 2002 with the 3 owners and 1 employee in a 1500sq ft. facility. From the beginning, we were known

for supplying quality advertising to Fortune 500 companies as well as the small to medium size businesses. In March of 2011, VI branched out into the Fleet market and in a short time established ourselves as a major player in the management of one of the top three leasing companies in the U.S. We currently employ over 15 employees, are in a much larger facility and manage over 80,000 fleet vehicles. Over the years, VI has grown and diversified from this modest beginning to rise to the top in the vehicle wrapping world and it is our hope to continue this growth with quality employees like yourself.

1

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.company_information: Our story began in 2002 with the 3 owners and 1 employee in a 1500sq ft. facility. From the beginning, we were known for supplying quality advertising to Fortune 500 companies as well as the small to medium size businesses. In March of 2011, VI branched out into the Fleet market and in a short time established ourselves as a major player in the management of one of the top three leasing companies in the U.S. We currently employ over 15 employees, are in a much larger facility and manage over 80,000 fleet vehicles. Over the years, VI has grown and diversified from this modest beginning to rise to the top in the vehicle wrapping world and it is our hope to continue this growth with quality employees like yourself.
